query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `messageTemplates` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `category` enum('interview_invitation', 'status_update', 'follow_up', 'rejection', 'offer', 'reminder', 'general') NOT NULL,
  `channelType` enum('email', 'sms', 'both') NOT NULL,
  `emailSubject` varchar(500),
  `emailBody` text,
  `emailHtml` text,
  `smsBody` text,
  `variables` json,
  `usageCount` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `isDefault` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `channelType_idx` (`channelType`),
  INDEX `isActive_idx` (`isActive`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `messageTemplates` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `category` enum('interview_invitation', 'status_update', 'follow_up', 'rejection', 'offer', 'reminder', 'general') NOT NULL,
  `channelType` enum('email', 'sms', 'both') NOT NULL,
  `emailSubject` varchar(500),
  `emailBody` text,
  `emailHtml` text,
  `smsBody` text,
  `variables` json,
  `usageCount` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `isDefault` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `channelType_idx` (`channelType`),
  INDEX `isActive_idx` (`isActive`)
)
